column5: Clearance bin! I never pass them by and here is why.

hmmm....maybe I am reading this wrong but are they claiming that Buffet Rig goes for $10 elswehere (or maybe even in their own store?). Seems like the price is inflated to show a huge savings. Either way, you got some new lures and that can't be a bad thing! Plus you scored 7 cents crapy tire money!
Here I thought you'd found some tramp in Lindsay..
What!! That never happens at Crapy Tire..   I have to wait all year for the 80% of screw driver set ?
Yeah, or a $400 socket set on sale for $99 and they are still making gobs of profit

Best deal is the MIG welder that is on sale every 2 weeks for $200 vs $600 regular price. They ordered 50,000 by mistake instead of 5000. They work great too, even on 100 feet of 14/3 extension cord...
